97 void MmwDemo_LVDSStream_EDMAInit (void)
98 {
99  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelAllocatorIndex = 0;
100  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.swSessionEDMAChannelAllocatorIndex = 0;
101 
102  /* Populate the LVDS Stream HW Session EDMA Channel Table: */
103  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[0].chainChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_CH_0;
104  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[0].shadowLinkChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_SHADOW_CH_0;
105  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[1].chainChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_CH_1;
106  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[1].shadowLinkChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_SHADOW_CH_1;
107  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[2].chainChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_CH_2;
108  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[2].shadowLinkChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_SHADOW_CH_2;
109  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[3].chainChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_CH_3;
110  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[3].shadowLinkChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_SHADOW_CH_3;
111  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[4].chainChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_CH_4;
112  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[4].shadowLinkChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_SHADOW_CH_4;
113  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[5].chainChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_CH_5;
114  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[5].shadowLinkChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_SHADOW_CH_5;
115  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[6].chainChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_CH_6;
116  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[6].shadowLinkChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_SHADOW_CH_6;
117  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[7].chainChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_CH_7;
118  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[7].shadowLinkChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_SHADOW_CH_7;
119  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[8].chainChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_CH_8;
120  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[8].shadowLinkChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_SHADOW_CH_8;
121  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[9].chainChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_CH_9;
122  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[9].shadowLinkChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_SHADOW_CH_9;
123 
124  /* Populate the LVDS Stream SW Session EDMA Channel Table: */
125  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.swSessionEDMAChannelTable[0].chainChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_SW_SESSION_EDMA_CH_0;
126  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.swSessionEDMAChannelTable[0].shadowLinkChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_SW_SESSION_EDMA_SHADOW_CH_0;
127  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.swSessionEDMAChannelTable[1].chainChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_SW_SESSION_EDMA_CH_1;
128  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.swSessionEDMAChannelTable[1].shadowLinkChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_SW_SESSION_EDMA_SHADOW_CH_1;
129 }
130 
143 int32_t MmwDemo_LVDSStreamInit (void)
144 {
145  CBUFF_InitCfg initCfg;
146  int32_t retVal = MINUS_ONE;
147  int32_t errCode;
148 
149  /*************************************************************************************
150  * Open the CBUFF Driver:
151  *************************************************************************************/
152  memset ((void *)&initCfg, 0, sizeof(CBUFF_InitCfg));
153 
154  /* Populate the configuration: */
155  initCfg.socHandle = gMmwMCB.socHandle;
156  initCfg.enableECC = 0U;
157  initCfg.crcEnable = 1U;
158  /* Up to 1 SW session + 1 HW session can be configured for each frame. Therefore max session is 2. */
159  initCfg.maxSessions = 2U;
160  initCfg.enableDebugMode = false;
161  initCfg.interface = CBUFF_Interface_LVDS;
162  initCfg.outputDataFmt = CBUFF_OutputDataFmt_16bit;
163  initCfg.u.lvdsCfg.crcEnable = 0U;
164  initCfg.u.lvdsCfg.msbFirst = 1U;
165  /* Enable all lanes available on the platform*/
166  initCfg.u.lvdsCfg.lvdsLaneEnable = 0xFU;
167  initCfg.u.lvdsCfg.ddrClockMode = 1U;
168  initCfg.u.lvdsCfg.ddrClockModeMux = 1U;
169 
170  /* Initialize the CBUFF Driver: */
171  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.cbuffHandle = CBUFF_init (&initCfg, &errCode);
172  if (gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.cbuffHandle == NULL)
173  {
174  /* Error: Unable to initialize the CBUFF Driver */
175  //System_printf("Error: CBUFF_init failed with [Error=%d]\n", errCode);
176  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
177  goto exit;
178  }
179 
180  /* Initialize the HSI Header Module: */
181  if (HSIHeader_init (&initCfg, &errCode) < 0)
182  {
183  /* Error: Unable to initialize the HSI Header Module */
184  //System_printf("Error: HSIHeader_init failed with [Error=%d]\n", errCode);
185  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
186  goto exit;
187  }
188 
189  /* Populate EDMA resources */
190  MmwDemo_LVDSStream_EDMAInit();
191 
192  retVal = 0;
193 
194 exit:
195  return retVal;
196 }
197 
209 static void MmwDemo_LVDSStream_EDMAAllocateCBUFFChannel
210 (
211  CBUFF_EDMAInfo* ptrEDMAInfo,
212  CBUFF_EDMAChannelCfg* ptrEDMACfg
213 )
214 {
215  if(ptrEDMAInfo->dmaNum == 0)
216  {
217  ptrEDMACfg->chainChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_CBUFF_EDMA_CH_0;
218  ptrEDMACfg->shadowLinkChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_CBUFF_EDMA_SHADOW_CH_0;
219  }
220  else if(ptrEDMAInfo->dmaNum == 1)
221  {
222  ptrEDMACfg->chainChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_CBUFF_EDMA_CH_1;
223  ptrEDMACfg->shadowLinkChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_CBUFF_EDMA_SHADOW_CH_1;
224  }
225  else
226  {
227  /* Max of 2 CBUFF sessions can be configured*/
228  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
229  }
230 }
231 
248 static int32_t MmwDemo_LVDSStream_EDMAAllocateCBUFFHwChannel
249 (
250  CBUFF_EDMAInfo* ptrEDMAInfo,
251  CBUFF_EDMAChannelCfg* ptrEDMACfg
252 )
253 {
254  int32_t retVal = MINUS_ONE;
255  MmwDemo_LVDSStream_MCB_t *streamMCBPtr = &gMmwMCB.lvdsStream;
256 
257  if(ptrEDMAInfo->isFirstEDMAChannel)
258  {
259  MmwDemo_LVDSStream_EDMAAllocateCBUFFChannel(ptrEDMAInfo, ptrEDMACfg);
260  retVal = 0;
261  }
262  else
263  {
264 
265  /* Sanity Check: Are there sufficient EDMA channels? */
266  if (streamMCBPtr->hwSessionEDMAChannelAllocatorIndex >= MMWDEMO_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_MAX_EDMA_CHANNEL)
267  {
268  /* Error: All the EDMA channels are allocated */
269  //System_printf ("Error: MmwDemo_LVDSStream_EDMAAllocateCBUFFChannel failed. HW channel index=%d\n", streamMCBPtr->hwSessionEDMAChannelAllocatorIndex);
270  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
271  goto exit;
272  }
273 
274  /* Copy over the allocated EDMA configuration. */
275  memcpy ((void *)ptrEDMACfg,
276  (void*)&streamMCBPtr->hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[streamMCBPtr->hwSessionEDMAChannelAllocatorIndex],
277  sizeof(CBUFF_EDMAChannelCfg));
278 
279  /* Increment the allocator index: */
280  streamMCBPtr->hwSessionEDMAChannelAllocatorIndex++;
281 
282  /* EDMA Channel allocated successfully */
283  retVal = 0;
284  }
285 
286 exit:
287  return retVal;
288 }
289 
306 static int32_t MmwDemo_LVDSStream_EDMAAllocateCBUFFSwChannel
307 (
308  CBUFF_EDMAInfo* ptrEDMAInfo,
309  CBUFF_EDMAChannelCfg* ptrEDMACfg
310 )
311 {
312  int32_t retVal = MINUS_ONE;
313  MmwDemo_LVDSStream_MCB_t *streamMCBPtr = &gMmwMCB.lvdsStream;
314 
315  if(ptrEDMAInfo->isFirstEDMAChannel)
316  {
317  MmwDemo_LVDSStream_EDMAAllocateCBUFFChannel(ptrEDMAInfo,ptrEDMACfg);
318  retVal = 0;
319  }
320  else
321  {
322  /* Sanity Check: Are there sufficient EDMA channels? */
323  if (streamMCBPtr->swSessionEDMAChannelAllocatorIndex >= MMWDEMO_LVDS_STREAM_SW_SESSION_MAX_EDMA_CHANNEL)
324  {
325  /* Error: All the EDMA channels are allocated */
326  //System_printf ("Error: MmwDemo_LVDSStream_EDMAAllocateCBUFFChannel failed. SW channel index=%d\n", streamMCBPtr->swSessionEDMAChannelAllocatorIndex);
327  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
328  goto exit;
329  }
330 
331  /* Copy over the allocated EDMA configuration. */
332  memcpy ((void *)ptrEDMACfg,
333  (void*)&streamMCBPtr->swSessionEDMAChannelTable[streamMCBPtr->swSessionEDMAChannelAllocatorIndex],
334  sizeof(CBUFF_EDMAChannelCfg));
335 
336  /* Increment the allocator index: */
337  streamMCBPtr->swSessionEDMAChannelAllocatorIndex++;
338 
339  /* EDMA Channel allocated successfully */
340  retVal = 0;
341  }
342 
343 exit:
344  return retVal;
345 }
346 
356 static void MmwDemo_LVDSStream_EDMAFreeCBUFFHwChannel (CBUFF_EDMAChannelCfg* ptrEDMACfg)
357 {
358  uint8_t index;
359  MmwDemo_LVDSStream_MCB_t *streamMCBPtr = &gMmwMCB.lvdsStream;
360 
361  if((ptrEDMACfg->chainChannelsId == MMW_LVDS_STREAM_CBUFF_EDMA_CH_0) ||
362  (ptrEDMACfg->chainChannelsId == MMW_LVDS_STREAM_CBUFF_EDMA_CH_1))
363  {
364  /*This is the CBUFF trigger channel. It is not part of the resource table so
365  nothing needs to be done*/
366  goto exit;
367  }
368 
369  for (index = 0U; index < MMWDEMO_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_MAX_EDMA_CHANNEL; index++)
370  {
371  /* Do we have a match? */
372  if (memcmp ((void*)ptrEDMACfg,
373  (void*)&streamMCBPtr->hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[index],
374  sizeof(CBUFF_EDMAChannelCfg)) == 0)
375  {
376  /* Yes: Decrement the HW Session index */
377  streamMCBPtr->hwSessionEDMAChannelAllocatorIndex--;
378  goto exit;
379  }
380  }
381 
382  /* Sanity Check: We should have had a match. An assertion is thrown to indicate that the EDMA channel
383  * being cleaned up does not belong to the table*/
384  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
385 
386 exit:
387  return;
388 }
389 
399 static void MmwDemo_LVDSStream_EDMAFreeCBUFFSwChannel (CBUFF_EDMAChannelCfg* ptrEDMACfg)
400 {
401  uint8_t index;
402  MmwDemo_LVDSStream_MCB_t *streamMCBPtr = &gMmwMCB.lvdsStream;
403 
404  if((ptrEDMACfg->chainChannelsId == MMW_LVDS_STREAM_CBUFF_EDMA_CH_0) ||
405  (ptrEDMACfg->chainChannelsId == MMW_LVDS_STREAM_CBUFF_EDMA_CH_1))
406  {
407  /*This is the CBUFF trigger channel. It is not part of the resource table so
408  nothing needs to be done*/
409  goto exit;
410  }
411 
412  for (index = 0U; index < MMWDEMO_LVDS_STREAM_SW_SESSION_MAX_EDMA_CHANNEL; index++)
413  {
414  /* Do we have a match? */
415  if (memcmp ((void*)ptrEDMACfg,
416  (void*)&streamMCBPtr->swSessionEDMAChannelTable[index],
417  sizeof(CBUFF_EDMAChannelCfg)) == 0)
418  {
419  /* Yes: Decrement the SW Session index */
420  streamMCBPtr->swSessionEDMAChannelAllocatorIndex--;
421  goto exit;
422  }
423  }
424 
425  /* Sanity Check: We should have had a match. An assertion is thrown to indicate that the EDMA channel
426  * being cleaned up does not belong to the table*/
427  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
428 
429 exit:
430  return;
431 }

446 void MmwDemo_LVDSStreamDeleteHwSession (CBUFF_SessionHandle sessionHandle)
447 {
448  int32_t errCode;
449  MmwDemo_LVDSStream_MCB_t* streamMcb = &gMmwMCB.lvdsStream;
450 
451  /* Delete session*/
452  if (CBUFF_deleteSession (sessionHandle, &errCode) < 0)
453  {
454  /* Error: Unable to delete the session. */
455  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
456  return;
457  }
458 
459  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionHandle = NULL;
460 
461  /* Did we stream out with the HSI Header? */
462  if (gMmwMCB.cliCfg.lvdsStreamCfg.isHeaderEnabled)
463  {
464  /* Delete the HSI Header: */
465  if (HSIHeader_deleteHeader (&streamMcb->hwSessionHSIHeader, &errCode) < 0)
466  {
467  /* Error: Unable to delete the HSI Header */
468  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
469  return;
470  }
471  }
472 }
473 
486 void MmwDemo_LVDSStreamDeleteSwSession (CBUFF_SessionHandle sessionHandle)
487 {
488  int32_t errCode;
489  MmwDemo_LVDSStream_MCB_t* streamMcb = &gMmwMCB.lvdsStream;
490 
491  /* Delete session*/
492  if (CBUFF_deleteSession (sessionHandle, &errCode) < 0)
493  {
494  /* Error: Unable to delete the session. */
495  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
496  return;
497  }
498 
499  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.swSessionHandle = NULL;
500 
501  /* Did we stream out with the HSI Header? */
502  if (gMmwMCB.cliCfg.lvdsStreamCfg.isHeaderEnabled)
503  {
504  /* Delete the HSI Header: */
505  if (HSIHeader_deleteHeader (&streamMcb->swSessionHSIHeader, &errCode) < 0)
506  {
507  /* Error: Unable to delete the HSI Header */
508  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
509  return;
510  }
511  }
512 }

526 static void MmwDemo_LVDSStream_HwTriggerFrameDone (CBUFF_SessionHandle sessionHandle)
527 {
528  int32_t errCode;
529 
530  /* Increment stats*/
531  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwFrameDoneCount++;
532 
533  if(sessionHandle != NULL)
534  {
535  /* If there is a software session configured, we need to
536  deactivate the HW session here.*/
537  if(gMmwMCB.cliCfg.lvdsStreamCfg.isSwEnabled == 1)
538  {
539  if(CBUFF_deactivateSession (sessionHandle, &errCode) < 0)
540  {
541  /* Error: Unable to deactivate the session. */
542  DebugP_assert(0);
543  return;
544  }
545  }
546  }
547  else
548  {
549  DebugP_assert(0);
550  }
551 
552  return;
553 }
554 
567 static void MmwDemo_LVDSStream_SwTriggerFrameDone (CBUFF_SessionHandle sessionHandle)
568 {
569  int32_t errCode;
570 
571  /* Increment stats*/
572  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.swFrameDoneCount++;
573 
574  if(sessionHandle != NULL)
575  {
576  if(CBUFF_deactivateSession (sessionHandle, &errCode) < 0)
577  {
578  /* Error: Unable to deactivate the session. */
579  DebugP_assert(0);
580  return;
581  }
582 
583  /*If a HW session has been configured, we need to
584  enable it here. */
585  if(gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionHandle != NULL)
586  {
587  if(CBUFF_activateSession (gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionHandle, &errCode) < 0)
588  {
589  DebugP_assert(0);
590  }
591  }
592  }
593  else
594  {
595  DebugP_assert(0);
596  }
597 
598  return;
599 }
600 
612 int32_t MmwDemo_LVDSStreamHwConfig (MmwDemo_DataPathObj *dataPathObj)
613 {
614  CBUFF_SessionCfg sessionCfg;
615  MmwDemo_LVDSStream_MCB_t* streamMcb = &gMmwMCB.lvdsStream;
616  int32_t errCode;
617  int32_t retVal = MINUS_ONE;
618 
619  memset ((void*)&sessionCfg, 0, sizeof(CBUFF_SessionCfg));
620 
621  /* Populate the configuration: */
622  sessionCfg.executionMode = CBUFF_SessionExecuteMode_HW;
623  sessionCfg.edmaHandle = dataPathObj->edmaHandle;
624  sessionCfg.allocateEDMAChannelFxn = MmwDemo_LVDSStream_EDMAAllocateCBUFFHwChannel;
625  sessionCfg.freeEDMAChannelFxn = MmwDemo_LVDSStream_EDMAFreeCBUFFHwChannel;
626  sessionCfg.frameDoneCallbackFxn = MmwDemo_LVDSStream_HwTriggerFrameDone;
627  sessionCfg.dataType = CBUFF_DataType_COMPLEX;
628  sessionCfg.u.hwCfg.dataMode = (CBUFF_DataMode)gMmwMCB.cliCfg.adcBufCfg.chInterleave;
629 
630  /* Populate the HW Session configuration: */
631  sessionCfg.u.hwCfg.adcBufHandle = dataPathObj->adcbufHandle;
632  sessionCfg.u.hwCfg.numADCSamples = dataPathObj->numAdcSamples;
633  sessionCfg.u.hwCfg.numChirpsPerFrame = dataPathObj->numChirpsPerFrame;
634  sessionCfg.u.hwCfg.chirpMode = dataPathObj->cliCfg->adcBufCfg.chirpThreshold;
635  sessionCfg.u.hwCfg.opMode = CBUFF_OperationalMode_CHIRP;
636 
637  switch(gMmwMCB.cliCfg.lvdsStreamCfg.dataFmt)
638  {
639  case 1:
640  sessionCfg.u.hwCfg.dataFormat = CBUFF_DataFmt_ADC_DATA;
641  break;
642  case 2:
643  sessionCfg.u.hwCfg.dataFormat = CBUFF_DataFmt_CP_ADC;
644  break;
645  case 3:
646  sessionCfg.u.hwCfg.dataFormat = CBUFF_DataFmt_ADC_CP;
647  break;
648  case 4:
649  sessionCfg.u.hwCfg.dataFormat = CBUFF_DataFmt_CP_ADC_CQ;
650  sessionCfg.u.hwCfg.cqSize[0] = 0;
651  sessionCfg.u.hwCfg.cqSize[1] = HSIHeader_toCBUFFUnits(dataPathObj->datapathCQ.sigImgMonTotalSize);
652  sessionCfg.u.hwCfg.cqSize[2] = HSIHeader_toCBUFFUnits(dataPathObj->datapathCQ.satMonTotalSize);
653  break;
654  default:
655  //System_printf ("Error: lvdsStreamCfg dataFmt %d is invalid\n", dataPathObj->cliCfg->lvdsStreamCfg.dataFmt);
656  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
657  break;
658  }
659 
660  if(dataPathObj->cliCfg->lvdsStreamCfg.isHeaderEnabled)
661  {
662  /* Create the HSI Header to be used for the HW Session: */
663  if (HSIHeader_createHeader (&sessionCfg, false, &(streamMcb->hwSessionHSIHeader), &errCode) < 0)
664  {
665  /* Error: Unable to create the HSI Header; report the error */
666  System_printf("Error: MmwDemo_LVDSStream_config unable to create HW HSI header with [Error=%d]\n", errCode);
667  goto exit;
668  }
669 
670  /* Setup the header in the CBUFF session configuration: */
671  sessionCfg.header.size = HSIHeader_getHeaderSize(&streamMcb->hwSessionHSIHeader);
672  sessionCfg.header.address = (uint32_t)&(streamMcb->hwSessionHSIHeader);
673  }
674 
675  /* Create the HW Session: */
676  streamMcb->hwSessionHandle = CBUFF_createSession (gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.cbuffHandle, &sessionCfg, &errCode);
677 
678  if (streamMcb->hwSessionHandle == NULL)
679  {
680  /* Error: Unable to create the CBUFF hardware session */
681  System_printf("Error: MmwDemo_LVDSStream_config unable to create the CBUFF hardware session with [Error=%d]\n", errCode);
682  goto exit;
683  }
684 
685  /* Control comes here implies that the LVDS Stream has been configured successfully */
686  retVal = 0;
687 
688 exit:
689  return retVal;
690 }
691 
703 int32_t MmwDemo_LVDSStreamSwConfig (MmwDemo_DataPathObj *dataPathObj)
704 {
705  CBUFF_SessionCfg sessionCfg;
706  MmwDemo_LVDSStream_MCB_t* streamMcb = &gMmwMCB.lvdsStream;
707  int32_t errCode;
708  int32_t retVal = MINUS_ONE;
709 
710  memset ((void*)&sessionCfg, 0, sizeof(CBUFF_SessionCfg));
711 
712  /* Populate the configuration: */
713  sessionCfg.executionMode = CBUFF_SessionExecuteMode_SW;
714  sessionCfg.edmaHandle = dataPathObj->edmaHandle;
715  sessionCfg.allocateEDMAChannelFxn = MmwDemo_LVDSStream_EDMAAllocateCBUFFSwChannel;
716  sessionCfg.freeEDMAChannelFxn = MmwDemo_LVDSStream_EDMAFreeCBUFFSwChannel;
717  sessionCfg.frameDoneCallbackFxn = MmwDemo_LVDSStream_SwTriggerFrameDone;
718  sessionCfg.dataType = CBUFF_DataType_COMPLEX;
719  sessionCfg.u.swCfg.userBufferInfo[0].size = HSIHeader_toCBUFFUnits(sizeof(MmwDemo_LVDSUserDataHeader_t));
720  sessionCfg.u.swCfg.userBufferInfo[0].address = (uint32_t)&(streamMcb->userDataHeader);
721  if(dataPathObj->numObjOut != 0)
722  {
723  sessionCfg.u.swCfg.userBufferInfo[1].size = HSIHeader_toCBUFFUnits((dataPathObj->numObjOut) * sizeof(MmwDemo_detectedObj));
724  sessionCfg.u.swCfg.userBufferInfo[1].address = (uint32_t)&dataPathObj->objOut[0];
725  }
726  else
727  {
728  sessionCfg.u.swCfg.userBufferInfo[1].size = 0;
729  sessionCfg.u.swCfg.userBufferInfo[1].address = 0;
730  }
731 
732  /* Do we need to enable the header? */
733  if(dataPathObj->cliCfg->lvdsStreamCfg.isHeaderEnabled)
734  {
735  /* Create the HSI Header to be used for the SW Session: */
736  if (HSIHeader_createHeader (&sessionCfg, true, &(streamMcb->swSessionHSIHeader), &errCode) < 0)
737  {
738  /* Error: Unable to create the HSI Header; report the error */
739  System_printf("Error: MmwDemo_LVDSStream_config unable to create HW HSI header with [Error=%d]\n", errCode);
740  goto exit;
741  }
742 
743  /* Setup the header in the CBUFF session configuration: */
744  sessionCfg.header.size = HSIHeader_getHeaderSize(&streamMcb->swSessionHSIHeader);
745  sessionCfg.header.address = (uint32_t)&(streamMcb->swSessionHSIHeader);
746  }
747 
748  /* Create the SW Session. */
749  streamMcb->swSessionHandle = CBUFF_createSession (gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.cbuffHandle, &sessionCfg, &errCode);
750 
751  if (streamMcb->swSessionHandle == NULL)
752  {
753  /* Error: Unable to create the CBUFF SW session */
754  System_printf("Error: MmwDemo_LVDSStream_config unable to create the CBUFF SW session with [Error=%d]\n", errCode);
755  goto exit;
756  }
757 
758  /* Control comes here implies that the LVDS Stream has been configured successfully */
759  retVal = 0;
760 
761 exit:
762  return retVal;
763 }
764 
774 void MmwDemo_LVDSStreamDelete (void)
775 {
776  int32_t errCode;
777 
778  /* Delete any active streaming session */
779  if(gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionHandle != NULL)
780  {
781  CBUFF_deactivateSession (gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionHandle, &errCode);
782  MmwDemo_LVDSStreamDeleteHwSession(gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionHandle);
783  }
784 
785  if(gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.swSessionHandle != NULL)
786  {
787  MmwDemo_LVDSStreamDeleteSwSession(gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.swSessionHandle);
788  }
789 }
